effects: Increase resistance to Light by 60% for 2 turns to all allies
Reduce damage received by 20% to all allies for 2 turns
name: Light Wall Technique

desc_short.0: Boost light resistance for all allies and reduce damage take for 2 turns
desc_short.5: Aumenta la res. a la luz de todos los aliados y reduce el daño que se recibe durante 2 turnos
